component.name: getContactFields
component.description: Retrieve all the details of contact fields.

component.name: getContactFieldById
component.description: Retrieve the details of given contact field id.

component.name: getContactFilters
component.description: Retrieve all the details of contact filters.

component.name: getContactFilterById
component.description: Retrieve the details of given contact filter id.

component.name: getContactImports
component.description: Retrieve all the details of contact imports.

component.name: getContactImportById
component.description: Retrieve the details of given contact import id.

component.name: getContactExports
component.description: Retrieve all the details of contact exports.

component.name: getContactExportById
component.description: Retrieve the details of given contact export id.

component.name: getContactLists
component.description: Retrieve all the details of contact lists.

component.name: getContactListById
component.description: Retrieve the details of given contact list id.

component.name: getContactSegments
component.description: Retrieve all the details of contact segments.

component.name: getContactSegmentById
component.description: Retrieve the details of given contact segment id.

component.name: getContactExportDataById
component.description: Retrieve the data of given contact export id.

component.name: createContactExport
component.description: Creates a new contact export definition.

component.name: createContactImport
component.description: Creates a new contact import definition.

component.name: createContactImportData
component.description: Submits the data for the contact import with the specified id.

component.name: deleteContactExport
component.description: Deletes the specified contacts export definition.

component.name: deleteContactExportData
component.description: Deletes the data for the contact export with the specified id.

component.name: deleteContactImport
component.description: Deletes the specified contact import definition.

component.name: deleteContactImportData
component.description: Deletes the data for the contact import with the specified id.

component.name: updateContactExport
component.description: Updates the contact export definition with the specified id.

component.name: updateContactImport
component.description: Updates the contact import definition with the specified id.
